verses.roman:
miśra kahe,--"śuna, prabhu, rājāra vacane
akapaṭe rājā ei kailā nivedane

synonyms: miśra kahe—Kāśī Miśra said; śuna—kindly hear; prabhu—my dear Lord; rājāra vacane—to the statement of the King; akapaṭe—without duplicity; rājā—the King; ei—this; kailā nivedane—has submitted.
translation: Kāśī Miśra said,"My dear Lord, the King has done this without reservations. Kindly hear his statement.
